The feedback bundle include electronic dashboard weekly feedback round physicians review performance . The control arm undergo audit feedback per current system , biweekly feedback emails performance .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Novel Audit Feedback Bundle Inpatient Performance
DOC.detailed_description: This single-blinded , cluster randomize control trial 48 internal medicine team ( 24 team randomize intervention arm 24 team randomize control arm ) inpatient medicine ward . Each team consist least 4 member ( attend physician , senior resident , two intern ) . The intervention arm team receive new audit feedback bundle , include access electronic dashboard weekly feedback round review performance several inpatient quality metric via electronic dashboard . The control arm undergo audit feedback per current system , biweekly feedback emails performance select quality measure . This primary aim trial compare effectiveness performance feedback inpatient quality metric specifically high quality visit summary , medical reconciliation discharge summary timeliness . Other group comparison include inpatient quality metric satisfaction feedback .
DOC.criteria: All physician rotate internal medicine ward study period ( teach attend physician internal medicine resident intern )
